At least 8 dead after migrant boat sinks off Turkey, state media saysAt least eight people drowned when a rubber boat carrying migrants sunk off Turkey's northwest province of Canakkale, the state-run Anadolu news agency reported on Friday. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 09:45:16 GMT UPGTA3I2PJNADEA7U7RLB5YWUM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/至少-8-dead-after-migrant-boat-sinks-off-turkey-state-media-says-2024-03-15/Reuters世界中东地区
Ukrainian drones attack Russian oil refinery in Kaluga region - sourceUkraine attacked a Russian oil refinery in Kaluga region with drones early on Friday, causing damage in an operation that was conducted by the GUR military spy agency, a Ukrainian intelligence source told Reuters. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 09:18:05 GMT P6P2GQVYENO4HNV7FIKWZNBN3Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-drones-attack- Russian-oil-refinery-kaluga-region-source-2024-03-15/Reuters世界欧洲
Aid supply ship from Cyprus reaches Gaza coastA ship towing a barge loaded with food arrived off Gaza on Friday, witnesses said, as a test run for a new aid route by sea from Cyprus into the devastated Palestinian enclave where famine looms after five months of Israel's military campaign. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 09:01:31 GMT GKZHDTWOWZK63DDDFJMPN4KX2E https://www.reuters.com/world/aid-supply-ship-cyprus-reaches-gaza-coast-2024-03-15/Reuters世界
Bulgarians pay last respects to Orthodox Patriarch NeophyteBulgarian worshippers thronged Sofia's golden-domed Alexander Nevsky Cathedral on Friday to pay their last respects to Orthodox Christian Patriarch Neophyte who died this week aged 78. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 08:55:17 GMT D2CG5BT465MWBCDRT7XYNYT4QQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/bulgarians-pay-last-respects-orthodox-patriarch-neophyte-2024-03-15/Reuters世界欧洲
Putin on brink of six more years in power as Russians voteRussia began three days of voting on Friday in an presidential election that is set to extend the rule of Vladimir Putin by six more years. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 08:52:04 GMT CSCNZIYV3BONNEWSI2TM32PEFM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-brink-six-more-years-power-Russians-vote-2024-03-15/Reuters世界欧洲
Egypt is striving to secure a ceasefire in Gaza, Sisi saysEgypt is seeking to reach a deal for a ceasefire in Gaza, increase entry of aid and to allow displaced people in the south of the enclave to move to the north, President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi said on Friday. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 08:38:50 GMT 2VCIHFJV4FIUHADLUCOW2ZEPHE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/egypt-is-striving-secure-ceasefire-gaza-sisi-says-2024-03-15/Reuters世界中东地区
Russia says it repelled attempted Ukrainian cross-border incursion on ThursdayRussia's defence ministry said on Friday that its forces had thwarted a Ukrainian attempt to launch a cross-border attack on Russia's Belgorod region on Thursday. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 08:31:26 GMT HXPH3DTJCBJGDMYVM3VACNKHY4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-says-it-repelled-attempted-ukrainian-cross-border-incursion-thursday-2024-03-15/Reuters世界欧洲
Hunters in Niger lament loss of range to Islamist threatHunting for small game is a traditional pursuit across the vast sandy steppes in West Africa's Sahel region, but rising violence linked to a decade-old fight with Islamist insurgents has limited the range for hunters in Niger like Abdou Kouda. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 08:02:13 GMT S3V4Z2HLRRJ6NISB2TRRTXDUME https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/hunters-niger-lament-loss-range-islamist-threat-2024-03-15/Mahamadou Hamidou, Abdel-Kader Mazou世界非洲
Russian national detained in Moscow for launching drones for UkraineRussia's Federal Security Service (FSB) said on Friday that a Russian national had been detained in Moscow on suspicion of treason and had confessed to assembling and launching drones on behalf of Ukraine. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 07:56:37 GMT YN7OICWSMZNPNECWIZN2XVSLZA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-national-detained-moscow-launching-drones-ukraine-2024-03-15/Reuters世界欧洲
Hezbollah tells Iran it would fight alone in any war with IsraelWith ally Hamas under attack in Gaza, the head of Iran's Quds Force visited Beirut in February to discuss the risk posed if Israel next aims at Lebanon's Hezbollah, an offensive that could severely hurt Tehran's main regional partner, seven sources said. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 07:36:59 GMT TGTDB5J4KJPATMJ2LKTJUCURFA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hezbollah-tells-iran-it-would-fight-alone-any-war-with-israel-2024-03-15/Samia Nakhoul, Parisa Hafezi, Laila Bassam世界中东地区
Belgorod, the city where the war in Ukraine came to RussiaAir raid sirens wail almost daily in the southern Russian city of Belgorod, sending people rushing for cover and reminding residents the full-scale war in neighbouring Ukraine is a reality for them too. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 07:05:54 GMT QMSMSQMZHBODLK6RRQA4L4SKME https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/belgorod-city-where-war-ukraine-came-Russia-2024-03-15/Vladimir Soldatkin世界欧洲
